name: TOAST (Sheol)
description:
TOAST About

Collaborate with a Smart Toaster™ and defend against the evil robot uprising! (which is really just household appliances my cat is afraid of) 

TOAST also actually stands for The Obviously AI Smart Toaster.

Controls

WASD to move, Space to pick and place toaster. Bring the toaster to the cog to upgrade it. 

Credits

Interior Art Assets by limezhu

Music and sounds from Soundly

Everything else, Me

will add pics and icons later.
